name: 2021-fullstackopen
description: 2021 full stack course Helsinki open university

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../osa2/puhelinluettelo/ && npm run build --prod && cp -r build ./
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy
